Cast of Characters
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): FAQ: The Most Important Game Info: Cast of Characters
By Trickster on Tuesday, October 2, 2001 - 01:29 pm:

The Cast of Characters

Shrine/Etc.:

"Grandpa" Bragma - Runs the shrine that allows you to regenerate monsters. Also acts as a mentor.

Mucchi - Wanders throughout the regions to sell and buy items, also sells the ran ran items at venturing time.

Morx

Gadamon - Fleria's main rival. A mean-tempered, vain young female trainer. Always causing trouble, mostly for Fleria, but for others as well.

Mitia - Another young female trainer around Gadamon's and Fleria's age, much kinder and gentler. Considers you a worthy opponent to match her skills against.

"Grandma" Mosha - An elderly female native of Morx and longtime trainer. Knows many things, and has a past with Bragma.

Taz - Mosha's nephew, a boy that loves to train Beaklons, which can cause him to stir up trouble.

Yuikyo - A new female breeder who is looking for a place to train monsters and gain experience. Very quiet, and not very confident.

Takrama

Haz - A young male breeder, very serious about his work.

Shimuka - An impetuous young male breeder, but good-hearted, if too impulsive. Pursuing a bad monster trainer in the area.

"Master/Grandpa" Lus - An elderly male trainer and Haz's teacher. Fairly quiet and serious, and calm.

Kalaragi

Lek - A young male breeder. Fairly carefree, knows the area fairly well.

Sansha - A female breeder, but cares more for fishing than for training it seems. Pretty laid-back.

Jimsey - A younger male trainer. Loves money too much, to the point of thievery.

Brillia

Maya - A young female breeder who is lonely in the cold area. Her family owns the land that you and Fleria use to train in this locale.

Taya - Maya's young brother. Very shy at first, somewhat less so as he gets to know you.

Nahze - A trainer that modifies monsters through creating and altering accessories. A bit naive in other matters. Owns a strange monster that he discovered called a Zan...

Goat

"Lord" Burn - A somewhat arrogant, hot-headed young male trainer, although after the first impressions he turns out to be a decent guy.

Ms. Jenna - A well-known female breeder, has acted as a mentor toward Fleria. She likes to battle, but is still good-tempered and fairly easygoing.

Kai - A shady male trainer that brings trouble with him. He claims to know something about the mysterious Joker monster...

Date - A somewhat young male breeder who is rich and arrogant. He doesn't seem to be intentionally rude, he just doesn't realize how his attitude rubs others. He seems to think many problems can be solved most easily with money.

Rip and Rap - A pair of little sisters who used to live near Fleria, and who can really hold a grudge when it comes to food.

Dagga - A mysterious man that can be summoned when the time and conditions are right, along with his powerful monster...
